alert.note: Alert for Metcalfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Metcalfe County through 645 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Edmonton, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 to 40 mph and small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Metcalfe County, including the following locations... Wisdom, Clarks Corner, Echo, Knob Lick, Beechville, Savoyard, New Liberty and Randolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
